name: Alex
main: I am looking for interesting work and to increase my skills as a Web Developer. Let's create some perfect together.
proger: For me, programming is a new field of activity. However, for me, this is the path that inspires and motivates for development. I started my journey by taking courses on Udemy. I believe that in order to achieve even a small result, you need to spend an indefinite number of hours and success will clearly come, the main thing is to love doing it.
workme: High-rise works, erection and dismantling of scaffolding, washing of facades and windows, snow removal from the roof. Did a telegram
blog_row: First website made. A small blog about rowing
web_app: A web application where you simply add or remove a number. Shows how state works in React
todo: A simple web application, adding and removing elements from the state
old: My old portfolio with more work
test_work: A test task where it was necessary to make the layout and integrate the API
test_redux: A test task where it was necessary to save the state. Used Redux
new: The new portfolio features a more contemporary design.
arenda_desc: Finalizing the site and creating a calculator on ReactJs
